product_name: SunCloud Pitstop Polarized Sunglasses - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Cutting glare and harmful UV rays, the men's SunCloud Pitstop Polarized Sunglasses are sharp in style-and optical clarity. Choose from black frames with gray polarized lenses, or brown frames with brown polarized lenses. Polarized polycarbonate injection-molded lenses cut glare, block 86% of visual light and offer 100% protection from harmful UVA and UVB rays. Grilamid frame material; custom metal logo plaques. Base 8 lens curvature wraps for side coverage. SunCloud Pitstop Polarized Sunglasses best fit large profiles.
short_description: Cutting glare and harmful UV rays, the men's SunCloud Pitstop Polarized Sunglasses are sharp in style-and optical clarity.
